Name: The Haunted Dolls
About the game: The Haunted Dolls is a unique survival horror game. It all starts when the man was going to his destination, suddenly a ghost appeared in front of him in the middle of the road causing him to veer from his path and collide with a tree. He entered an abandoned place to look for help and found himself locked inside surrounded by ghosts and evil spirits. He quickly realizes that he has fallen victim to black magic and begins to find his way out as he faces many terrifying and difficult obstacles. Features Singleplayer / Story mode.
